alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Steuben County through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elkland, or 19 miles southwest of Corning, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caton, Lindley, Painted Post, Addison, Woodhull, Lawrenceville, Gang Mills, Coopers Plains, Erwins and Pinnacle State Park. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 41 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
